title: A Union of shame
description: Trump is dancing rings around the EU, which just looks dazed and confused. When will we finally concede that the US doesn’t love us anymore?
content: Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice, shame on me. So goes the old proverb about untrustworthy relations, which has repeatedly come to mind regarding the Transatlantic relationship this past yea… [+5978 chars]
